Harsheel Soin

Data Scientist at Audible, Inc.

LinkedIn     Github

Education

I hold a Masters degree in Data Science from Columbia University, and Bachelors and Masters degrees in Biotechnology & Biochemical Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur

Experience

I interned with Audible as a Data Science Research Assistant (May - Dec, 2018), completed my Data Science Capstone Project with Goldman Sachs (Sep - Dec, 2018), and interned with Capillary Technolgies as a Software Developer (May - Jul, 2016)

Data Science Projects

Projects that I worked on include Analyzing New York City Motor Vehicle Collisions, Predicting the Optimal Lineup for Daily Fantasy Football, and Designing a Robotic Exoskeleton for Stroke/Amputee Patient Rehabilitation

Achievements & Leadership

I served as an Executive Board Member of Columbia Data Science Society (2017-18), and was awarded the prestigious J.N. Tata Scholarship (2017) towards my Masters in Data Science at Columbia University. More on my past leadership roles & achievements
